key.name: nbcols
key.description: Sets the number of column of emojis to display.

key.name: emojisize
key.description: Default size of emojis (px) ; doesn't concern recently used items

key.name: use-keybinding
key.description: if true, Super+E will toggle the menu.

key.name: always-show
key.summary: if icon should always be shown
key.description: if false, Super+E will be the only way to display the popup menu.

key.name: light-theme
key.summary: if a darker font is used
key.description: if true, emojis characters will be black (adapted for GS themes which are light).

key.name: skin-tone
key.description: 0 is none, 1 is light, ..., 5 is dark.

key.name: gender
key.description: 0 is none, 1 is women, 2 is men.

key.name: emoji-keybinding
key.description: Keyboard shortcut which opens the extension's menu.
